## Description {#details}

A random number generator.

Instances of this class should not be shared across threads. The seed should be set by passing the -rng-seed=&lt;uint64&gt; option. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module/#a8b82325a22b25d4278a37af30b202a30">Module::createRNG</a> to create a new RNG instance for use with that module.

Definition at line 32 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/randomnumbergenerator-h">RandomNumberGenerator.h</a>.

## Private Constructors

### RandomNumberGenerator() {#a193c6096ea473683bde7b4a64ca64017}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>RandomNumberGenerator::RandomNumberGenerator (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Salt)</>}>
Seeds and salts the underlying RNG engine.

This constructor should not be used directly. Instead use <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module/#a8b82325a22b25d4278a37af30b202a30">Module::createRNG</a> to create a new RNG salted with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/randomnumbergenerator-h/#l00054">54</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/randomnumbergenerator-h">RandomNumberGenerator.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/randomnumbergenerator-cpp/#l00045">45</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/randomnumbergenerator-cpp">RandomNumberGenerator.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
